NearMissajous

A simulation by @abvaden
Based on a creation by Matt Parker
That tries to draw a lissajoue curve

Simulation Parameters

This is best viewed in landscape mode on a small device

Description

The simulation being shown is that of a NearMissajous machine, as initially created by @StandUpMaths


The NearMissajous machine was devised as machine that could drawing an approximate lissajoue curve. For more information please see the original video created by @StandUpMaths
